Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Djedbastineks(y) born of Nitirdis with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a plaited beard, the waist is inscribed with a row of incised hieroglyphs, the front of the leg section is similarly inscribed; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: SLAntiq (number still to be ascertained)
